parts: ನಮಸ್ಕಾರ! ನಾನು ನಿಮಗೆ ಹೇಗೆ ಸಹಾಯ ಮಾಡಬಹುದು? (Namaskara! Nanu nimage hege sahaya madabahudu?)
what is the name of the pdf
The name of the PDF is "Revanth AkulaAIML.pdf".
smmarise the pdf

Okay, here is a summary of the "Revanth AkulaAIML.pdf" document:

Revanth Akula is a B.Tech Computer Science Engineering student specializing in AIML at Malla Reddy University, expected to graduate in 2028. He has a strong academic background with high scores in his secondary and senior secondary education. Revanth has pursued certifications in areas like Full Stack Development, SQL, Cybersecurity, CSS, and Data Science. His project experience includes sign language detection using machine learning, creating an Amazon dashboard clone, and developing a personal portfolio website. He possesses skills in programming languages such as C/C++ and Python, web development technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Flask, Django), and databases like MySQL and MongoDB. Additionally, he has knowledge in core computer science concepts like Data Structures and Algorithms, OOPs, and Operating Systems. Overall, the document highlights Revanth's qualifications and experiences relevant to his field of study and potential career paths.
is this created by ai or created by himself

Based on the content of the PDF, it seems highly likely that Revanth Akula created the document himself. It includes personal contact information, details about his education, specific projects he has worked on, and his own skills. These are the types of details that a person typically compiles themselves when creating a resume or personal profile. While AI could potentially generate a similar document, the specific details and personal touch suggest that it was created by Revanth.

WHAT ARE THE PROJECTS HE HAVE DONE

Based on the uploaded PDF, Revanth has worked on the following projects:

   Sign Language Detection: A machine learning project that takes a video as input and outputs the word being signed. It's intended to help deaf people communicate. (Tensorflow, Keras, Python)
   Miro-Agent: A frontend-only clone of an Amazon dashboard showcasing product listings and UI interactivity. (HTML, CSS)
   AI Virtual Mouse: A full-stack personal portfolio combining a frontend interface with backend functionality to highlight professional achievements and technical expertise. (Flask, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript, MySQL)
Speak Telugu.
సరే, నేను తెలుగులో మాట్లాడగలను. మీకు ఏమి కావాలో అడగండి. (Okay, nēnu telugulō māṭlāḍagalanu. Mīku ēmi kāvālō aḍagaṇḍi.)
Aim yes or no?
క్షమించండి, నాకు అర్థం కాలేదు. దయచేసి మీరు ఏమి అడుగుతున్నారో వివరించగలరా? (Kshamin̄caṇḍi, nāku arthaṁ kālēdu. Dayacēsi mīru ēmi aḍugutunnārō vivarin̄cagalaraa?)
